p.s: This wikiHow teaches you how to enable adult and Not Safe for Work ( NSFW ) on Reddit using a computer , phone , or tablet .
Though there 's no option to allow NSFW content in the official Reddit mobile app , your preferences from Reddit.com will carry over .
Due to Google and Apple Store restrictions , some NSFW may remain unavailable in the mobile app , even after adjusting your settings .

head.s: Using Reddit on a Phone or Tablet

item.s: Open a web browser on your phone or tablet .
Although there 's no way to change your NSFW content preferences in the official Reddit app , you can get the job done in your web browser .
Changes you make to your account settings on Reddit.com will carry over to the official mobile app .

item.s: Slide the “ Safe browsing ” switch to Off ( optional ) .
If this switch is On ( blue ) , NSFW/adult thumbnails and previews will be blurred in the feed and on the search page .
If you want these images to be clear , turn the switch Off ( white/gray ) .

item.s: Due to regulations by the Apple App Store and Google Play Store , some NSFW content may appear blurred in the search results , even after changing these settings .
Scroll down and click .
It ’s the gray button near the bottom-left corner of the page .
Your Reddit options are now updated , and you will see NSFW content all across the website .
If you use the Reddit app on an Android , iPhone , or iPad , you may need to force-close the app and then re-open it before your settings take effect .
The Reddit app prevents certain types of NSFW content from displaying on the mobile app .
This is because both the iOS App Store and the Google Play Store have restrictions on the kind of content that apps can display .
